description: APPLICATION FOR PRIOR APPROVAL IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION WITH A DEPTH OF 3.5M, EAVES HEIGHT OF 2.7M AND MAXIMUM HEIGHT 3.75M.
decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason: In the absence of drawings, it has been determined in line with A.4 (2)(b) and (3)(b) of the General Permitted Development Order (GPDO) 2015 (as amended) that the developer has not provided a plan drawing indicating the site and the proposed development nor provided insufficient information to enable the authority to establish whether the proposed development complies with, the conditions, limitations or restrictions applicable to development permitted by Class A which exceeds the limits in paragraph A.1(f) but is allowed by paragraph A.1(g).

Reason : 2 - Under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended), prior approval would be required and REFUSED for the following reason: In the absence of proposed materials it cannot be determined if the proposed materials would be similar in appearance to the existing dwellinghouse, therefore the proposal would not accord with condition A.3(a) of Class A Part 1 Schedule 2 of the Town and Country (General Permitted Development) Order 2015 (as amended).
